title: Musical Clock Stand, 1745–49
markings: stamped with the crowned "C" tax mark on one foot.
provenance:
Gift of Gerald Stiebel, 2014, 
With Rosenberg and Stiebel continuously from prior to 1965.
creditline: Gift of Gerald Stiebel in memory of Eric Stiebel
description: formed of a series of S-curves in ormolu, surrounding a grille on the top with curvy scroll decoration, the front and back of different scroll forms, the front with central asymmetrical shell

tombstone.epitaph: Musical Clock Stand, 1745–49. Molded and chased gilt bronze. Gift of Gerald Stiebel in memory of Eric Stiebel. 2014-5-1.
